
# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book contains the materials for the course
*Introduction to R/Bioconductor*, which I offer
in partnership with [Physalia courses](https://www.physalia-courses.org/).
This is a 5-day course, and the contents covered in the course are:

1. Getting started with R data classes
2. Data analysis with the tidyverse
3. Visualizing data with {ggplot2}
4. Introduction to Bioconductor data classes - part 1
5. Introduction to Bioconductor data classes - part 2
